titleStmt.title: Infant-baptism from heaven, and not of men, or, A moderate discourse concerning the baptism of the infant-seed of believers whereunto is prefixed, a large introductory preface, preparing the readers way to a more profitable perusal of the ensuing treatise / by Joseph Whiston.
titleStmt.author: Whiston, Joseph, d. 1690.

notesStmt.note: Error in paging: p. 157-176 omitted in numbering only.
Imperfect: faded and stained, with considerable print show-through and loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
